about_the_game:
ALL OUT WAR: Welcome To The Front.

The most immersive war game with more than 10 years of development. Experience battle on a global-scale. Many countries, more weapons, even more destruction. Defend your country from threats around the world, utilizing all your resources - Air, Sea, and Ground. Travel across real-world territories, NO PASSPORT NEEDED, realistic visuals and sounds unique to each location.

On the battlefield, CONTOL EVERY VEHICLE.

- 25+ Missions spanning the globe
- Real-world locations
- Ground-breaking Visual Effects
- Immersive Sound utilizing Dolby Atmos Surround Sound
- Intense Combat Experience
- Next-Gen AI Enemies (E-CB Human - like)

The most anticipated war game in this era.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a war video game. Violence is part of war, therefore, this game has scenes depicting violence and destruction. The game features real locations around that globe where battles take place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Modern
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 4790, AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE 1070 or better, AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Modern
